name: (FINAL)Volcano Vanquish - Team 4
description:
You are a Gingerbread hiker who has fell into a large volcano. Despite living from this unrealistic fall and not crumbling, you face another great threat. The volcano is active, and the lava begins to rise. You need to use your grappling hook to try and escape to the top of the volcano before the lava melts you alive. Though you may soon realize there is no escaping mother nature.

Controls:

LMB: shoot grapple hook

A/D: move left/right

Space: Jump 

People of Team 4:

Ben Ogden

Alexis Rivera

Noah Yacko

Carly Kehoe

Kayla Potter
